welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sofia, Bulgaria! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning architecture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in everything Sofia has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Rainbow Factory (Фабрика ДЪГА / Rainbow Factory)
restaurants.description: Rainbow Factory (Фабрика ДЪГА / Rainbow Factory) is a café located in София.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.
